workflow.name: Generate UGC promo videos with OpenAI, Sora 2 and Blotato for eCommerce
workflow.description:
# üí• Generate UGC Promo Videos with Blotato and Sora 2 for eCommerce

![Workflow Overview](https://www.dr-firas.com/sora22.png)

### üß© Who is this for?
This workflow is perfect for **eCommerce brands, content creators, and marketing teams** who want to automatically generate short, eye-catching videos from their product images ‚Äî without editing software or manual work.

### üöÄ What problem does this workflow solve?
Creating engaging promotional videos manually can be time-consuming and expensive.  
This automation eliminates that friction by combining **Blotato**, **Sora 2**, and **AI scripting** to turn static product images into dynamic UGC-style videos ready for **TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts**.

### ‚öôÔ∏è What this workflow does
This workflow:
1. Receives a **product image** directly from Telegram or another input source.  
2. Analyzes the image with **OpenAI Vision** to understand the product‚Äôs features and audience.  
3. Generates a natural, short **UGC-style script** using GPT-based AI.  
4. Sends the image and script to **Sora 2 via the Fal API** to generate a **vertical promotional video**.  
5. Monitors the video status every 15 seconds until completion.  
6. Downloads or automatically publishes the final video to your social platforms.

### üß† Setup
1. Create a **Fal.ai API key** and set it in your n8n credentials (`Authorization: Key YOUR_FAL_KEY`).  
2. Connect your **Telegram**, **OpenAI**, and **HTTP Request** nodes as shown in the workflow.  
3. Make sure the `Build Public Image URL` node outputs a valid, public image link.  
4. In the HTTP Request node for Sora 2, set:  
   - **Method:** POST  
   - **URL:** `https://fal.run/fal-ai/sora-2/image-to-video`  
   - **Headers:**  
     - `Authorization: Key YOUR_FAL_KEY`  
     - `Content-Type: application/json`  
   - **Body:** Raw JSON with parameters like `prompt`, `image_url`, `duration`, and `aspect_ratio`.  
5. Run the workflow and monitor the execution logs for your video URL.
6. [Blotato](https://blotato.com/?ref=firas) ‚Üí API key for social media publishing  


### üé® How to customize this workflow to your needs
- üßæ **Change the video tone:** Edit the OpenAI prompt to produce educational, emotional, or luxury-style scripts.  
- üé¨ **Adjust duration or format:** Use Sora 2‚Äôs supported durations (4, 8, or 12 seconds) and aspect ratios (e.g., `9:16` for social media).  
- üì≤ **Auto-publish your videos:** Connect the TikTok, Instagram, or YouTube upload nodes for full automation.  
- ‚ú® **Add branding:** Include overlays, logos, or end screens via CapCut or an external API integration.

### üé• [Watch This Tutorial](https://youtu.be/SZMWXW8Vk8E)

![SORA2 logo](https://www.dr-firas.com/sora2YT.png)

---
### üëã Need help or want to customize this?
üì© Contact: [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-firas/)  
üì∫ YouTube: [@DRFIRASS](https://www.youtube.com/@DRFIRASS)  
üöÄ Workshops: [Mes Ateliers n8n](https://hotm.art/formation-n8n)

---
üìÑ **Documentation**: [Notion Guide](https://automatisation.notion.site/Generate-UGC-Promo-Videos-with-Blotato-and-Sora-2-for-eCommerce-2a23d6550fd980898426fe195192da6d?source=copy_link)
### Need help customizing?
Contact me for consulting and support : [Linkedin](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-firas/) / [Youtube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCriIQI8uaoEro5FEnOpeidQ) / [üöÄ Mes Ateliers n8n  ](https://hotm.art/formation-n8n)

workflow.name: üí• Generate UGC Promo Videos with Blotato and Sora 2 for eCommerce vi

parameters.text: Video generation timed out or failed. Please try again with a different product image or description.

=Analyze this product image and extract: 1) Product name and category, 2) Key features and benefits, 3) Target audience, 4) Visual elements (colors, style, packaging). Promotion objective: {{ $('Extract Photo and text').item.json.promotionText }}

values.content: You are a UGC video script writer. Create a 12-second video script with frame-by-frame breakdown, natural dialogue, camera movements, and captions. Format as JSON with fields: frames (array of {timestamp, scene, dialogue, camera, caption}), hashtags (array).

parameters.content:
# üì§ STEP 5: PUBLISHING & TRACKING

### Install the Blotato [Blotato](https://blotato.com/?ref=firas) Node in n8n (Community Nodes)
1. In n8n, open **Settings ‚Üí Community Nodes**.  
2. Click **Install**, then add: `@blotato/n8n-nodes-blotato`.  
3. Log in to **Blotato**.  
4. Go to **Settings ‚Üí API Keys**.  
5. In n8n ‚Üí **Credentials ‚Üí New**.  
6. Choose **Blotato API** 
(provided by the community node you installed).  

2. TikTok Publishing (Blotato):
   ‚Ä¢ Pre-configured to auto-publish
   ‚Ä¢ Uses caption from GPT-4
   ‚Ä¢ Privacy: Public
   ‚Ä¢ Requires Blotato API key from Step 2

values.content:
=Create an engaging TikTok caption for a video about: {{ $('Telegram Trigger').first().json.message.caption }}

Based on these trends: {{ $('Generate UGC Script (OpenAI)').first().json.message.content.hashtags[0] }}{{ $('Generate UGC Script (OpenAI)').first().json.message.content.hashtags[1] }}{{ $('Generate UGC Script (OpenAI)').first().json.message.content.hashtags[2] }}

Requirements:
- Catchy hook in first line
- Include 5-8 relevant trending hashtags
- Keep it concise and engaging
- Optimize for TikTok algorithm
- Return ONLY the caption text with hashtags, nothing else

parameters.content:
# üì± STEP 1: TELEGRAM BOT SETUP

## üìÑ **Documentation**: [Notion Guide](https://automatisation.notion.site/Generate-UGC-Promo-Videos-with-Blotato-and-Sora-2-for-eCommerce-2a23d6550fd980898426fe195192da6d?source=copy_link)

## Create Your Telegram Bot:
1. Open Telegram and search for @BotFather
2. Send /newbot command
3. Choose a name for your bot (e.g., "UGC Video Generator")
4. Choose a username (must end with 'bot', e.g., "myugc_video_bot")
5. Copy the API token provided

## Configure Telegram Trigger Node:
1. Click on "Telegram Trigger" node
2. Create new credential
3. Paste your bot token
4. Save credential

## Configure Telegram Nodes:
The following nodes need the same credential:
‚Ä¢ Get Photo File from Telegram
‚Ä¢ Send Video to Telegram
‚Ä¢ Send Error Message

## Test Your Bot:
1. Activate this workflow
2. Find your bot in Telegram
3. Send /start to begin
4. Send a product image with caption

# ‚öôÔ∏è STEP 2: API KEYS CONFIGURATION

## Workflow Configuration Node:
This node stores all API keys and settings.

### 1. FAL.ai API Key:
‚Ä¢ Go to https://fal.ai/
‚Ä¢ Sign up / Log in
‚Ä¢ Navigate to Dashboard ‚Üí API Keys
‚Ä¢ Create new API key
‚Ä¢ Copy and paste in 'falApiKey' field

### 2. OpenAI API Key:
‚Ä¢ Already configured with n8n free credits
‚Ä¢ Or use your own: https://platform.openai.com/api-keys

### 3. Video Settings (Pre-configured):
‚Ä¢ maxPollingAttempts: 20 (max wait cycles)
‚Ä¢ Model: sora-2
‚Ä¢ aspect_ratio: 9:16 (vertical video)
‚Ä¢ duration: 12 (seconds)

üí° You can adjust these values based on your needs:
- Change duration: 5, 10, or 12 seconds
- Change aspect_ratio: 16:9, 9:16, or 1:1

# ü§ñ STEP 3: AI ANALYSIS & SCRIPT GENERATION

## How It Works:

### Extract Photo and Text:
‚Ä¢ Extracts the highest quality photo from Telegram
‚Ä¢ Captures your promotion text/caption

### Get Photo File from Telegram:
‚Ä¢ Downloads the actual image file
‚Ä¢ Prepares it for AI analysis

### Build Public Image URL:
‚Ä¢ Uploads image to tmpfiles.org
‚Ä¢ Creates publicly accessible URL
‚Ä¢ Required for Sora 2 API

### Analyze Product Image (Vision API):
‚Ä¢ Uses GPT-4o-mini with vision
‚Ä¢ Analyzes: product features, target audience, visual style
‚Ä¢ Extracts key selling points

### Generate UGC Script (OpenAI):
‚Ä¢ Creates 12-second video script
‚Ä¢ Frame-by-frame breakdown
‚Ä¢ Natural dialogue and camera movements
‚Ä¢ Generates trending hashtags
‚Ä¢ Output: JSON format with frames array

‚úÖ No configuration needed - already set up!

# üé• STEP 4: VIDEO GENERATION WITH SORA 2

## Process Flow:

### 1. Submit to Sora 2 API:
‚Ä¢ Sends image URL + script to FAL.ai
‚Ä¢ Uses Sora 2 image-to-video model
‚Ä¢ Returns job request_id

### 2. Polling Loop (Wait ‚Üí Check ‚Üí Parse):
‚Ä¢ Waits 15 seconds between checks
‚Ä¢ Checks video generation status
‚Ä¢ Continues until complete or timeout
‚Ä¢ Max attempts: 20 (configurable)

### 3. Check If Complete:
Routes based on status:
‚Ä¢ ‚úÖ COMPLETED/succeeded ‚Üí Download video
‚Ä¢ ‚è≥ IN_PROGRESS ‚Üí Continue polling
‚Ä¢ ‚ùå Timeout ‚Üí Send error message

### 4. Download Video File:
‚Ä¢ Retrieves final video from FAL.ai
‚Ä¢ Prepares for Telegram delivery

### 5. Send Video to Telegram:
‚Ä¢ Delivers video to your chat
‚Ä¢ Includes video URL in caption

# üé¨ AUTOMATED UGC VIDEO GENERATOR

### üé• Watch This Tutorial

@[youtube](SZMWXW8Vk8E)

## üìã What This Workflow Does:
Transforms product images into professional UGC marketing videos automatically:

1Ô∏è‚É£ Receives product image + description via Telegram
2Ô∏è‚É£ AI analyzes product features and target audience
3Ô∏è‚É£ Generates engaging 12-second video script
4Ô∏è‚É£ Creates video using Sora 2 AI (image-to-video)
5Ô∏è‚É£ Delivers final video back to Telegram

## üì¨ Need Help or Want to Customize This?
**Contact me for consulting and support:** [LinkedIn](https://www.linkedin.com/in/dr-firas/) / [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/@DRFIRASS)  / [üöÄ Mes Ateliers n8n  ](https://hotm.art/formation-n8n)

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.
